metrics.name: uptime
metrics.description: Number of milliseconds since the container was started

metrics.name: cpu/usage
metrics.description: Cumulative CPU usage on all cores

metrics.name: memory/working_set
metrics.description: Total working set usage. Working set is the memory being used and not easily dropped by the kernel

metrics.name: network/rx
metrics.description: Cumulative number of bytes received over the network

metrics.name: network/rx_errors
metrics.description: Cumulative number of errors while receiving over the network

metrics.name: network/tx
metrics.description: Cumulative number of bytes sent over the network

metrics.name: network/tx_errors
metrics.description: Cumulative number of errors while sending over the network

metrics.name: filesystem/usage
metrics.description: Total number of bytes consumed on a filesystem

metrics.name: filesystem/limit
metrics.description: The total size of filesystem in bytes

metrics.name: filesystem/available
metrics.description: The number of available bytes remaining in a the filesystem

common_labels.description: Identifier specific to a host. Set by cloud provider or user
User-provided name of the container or full container name for system containers
User-defined image name that is run inside the container

pod_labels.description: The unique ID of the pod
The UID of namespace of the pod
